itemInfo.itemDesc: An Axion Shield developed to its maximum potential.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Axion Shield of Crimson Flame, Axion Shield of Destruction, Axion Shield of Temptation, Axion Shield

item.name: Steel
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Iron Shards and Coal together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Pure Iron Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Iron Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Soft Hide
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Drying deer, sheep, or fox hide.

item.name: Powder of Flame
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: There’s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Axion Shield of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Axion Shield.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Axion Shield of Crimson Flame, Axion Shield

item.name: Grade 3 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 3rd-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Axion Shield
item.desc: A steel-plated shield used more for attacking than defending.

item.name: Axion Shield of Destruction
item.desc: The energy of Destruction is contained within this Axion Shield.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Axion Shield of Destruction, Axion Shield

item.name: Axion Shield of Crimson Flame
item.desc: The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Axion Shield.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Axion Shield of Crimson Flame, Axion Shield

item.name: Axion Shield of Temptation
item.desc: The energy of Temptation is contained within this Axion Shield.\n\n- Repair to Max. Durability: Axion Shield of Temptation, Axion Shield
